subject: JS_Tips
question:
Useful tips
1.- Declare all functions before you call them.
2.- Declare all variables at the top of the function.
3.- Declare the For loop counter variable VAR at the top of the parent function, because it is not scoped to the block.
4.- Pending the LET variable...
5.- Never use Global variables, if you use them, write them in UPPERCASE.
6.- Stop using "x++" or "++x" use "x += 1" instead.
7.- Stop saving typing, make your code more readable and understandable, like in the if statement
